EmailTemplate.name: Spring-2013_UserGroups.Email-1
EmailTemplate.subject: TriTech's 2013 Perform Spring User Groups - Complimentary Training and Lunch!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: STAY CONNECTED  2013 Perform Spring User Groups Seats Are Limited! Register Now! Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, We are excited to bring you an expanded agenda for our series of annual Spring User Group meetings this year. Don't miss out on your opportunity for free training, in addition to the other valuable information provided through these events. We have several locations/dates for you to choose from, but register soon before your preferred selection fills up! Join us for the latest news and complimentary training from TriTech: - Perform Product Suite – features available in Version 6.1 and what’s coming in Version 6.2 - Perform Support Team – Customer Service Center (new support portal) - Sales Programs – product promotions and activities - Update on the Perform Training Institute – Upcoming Regional Classes and the Fall Training Summit - On-site lunch (complimentary) - Complimentary Security Training – a TriTech Software Trainer will provide training on how to manage security rights within the Perform software. You will learn how to manage individual and group rights as well as additional security settings such as challenge questions, strong passwords, and user account lock outs. I hope to see you there! Phil Sisk Director of Account Management & Sales Questions? Contact Your Client Account Manager: David Bell | (774) 239-3722 | david.bell@tritech.com Massachusetts, New Jersey, Connecticut, Florida, New York and Vermont Mark Baranowski | (978) 215-2270 | mark.baranowski@tritech.com Rhode Island, New Hampshire, Maine, Idaho, Montana, Arkansas, Oklahoma, Illinois, and Wisconsin Dates and Locations Time: 9 AM - 3 PM Perform Product Suite – features available in Version 6.1 and what’s coming in Version 6.2 Perform Support Team – Customer Service Center, etc. Sales Programs – product promotions and activities Update on the Perform Training Institute – Upcoming Regional Classes and the Fall Training Summit On-site lunch (complimentary) Complimentary Security Training – learn from a TriTech instructor about Rights in the Security section of your Perform software, which impacts your department’s daily operations REGISTER NOW: http://offers.tritech.com/Spring-2013_UserGroups_Registration.html" target="_blank"> April 23 - MEMA, Agawam, MA 1002 Suffield Street, Agawam MA April 25 - Wakefield, MA PD One Union Street, Wakefield MA May 3 - Dennis, MA PD 90 Bob Crowell Road, South Dennis MA CONNECTICUT April 30 - Clinton, CT PD 170 East Main Street, Clinton CT RHODE ISLAND May 1 - Community College of RI One John H. Chafee Blvd. Newport RI NEW HAMPSHIRE May 6 - Nashua, NH PD Panther Drive, Nashua NH May 7 - Lincoln, NH PD 148 Main Street, Lincoln NH MAINE May 9 - Maine State Police 45 Commerce Drive, Suite 1, Augusta ME NEW JERSEY May 21 - Howell, NJ Police 300 Old Tavern Road, Howell NJ
